name: Louis Gray
overview:
Louis Gray is Program Manager of [Google Developers Live](http://developers.google.com/live/) at [Google](http://www.google.com) and author of [louisgray.com](http://blog.louisgray.com/), a Silicon Valley-based early adopter technology blog.
Prior to joining Google in August 2011, Louis was Vice President of Marketing at [my6sense](http://www.my6sense.com) and co-founder of [Paladin Advisors Group](http://www.paladinag.com). From 2001 to 2009, Louis was the Director of Corporate Marketing at [BlueArc](http://www.bluearc.com), a high performance network storage company based in San Jose. BlueArc was acquired by Hitachi Data Systems in 2011.
Prior to BlueArc, Louis was Web Marketing Manager at 3Cube, an Web communications startup. 3Cube was acquired by [Oracle](http://www.oracle.com) in 2001.
